alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 8:51PM PST until January 26 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...A portion of central California. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 11 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highway affected include, but are not limited to Highway 152, Interstate 5 north of Lost Hills, Highway 198 west of Hanford, Highway 180 west of Fresno, and Highway 41 south of Fresno.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
